#BlackMagicCraft #Episode117

In this video I create the foundation for my snow terrain set....SNOW BATTLE BOARDS! You could go with a basic white sheet or a white gridded dry erase battle mat, or you could go all out and make some custom foam boards with gridded snow. 

IF YOU DON'T FEEL LIKE BUILDING AND WANT TO JUST GRAB THE BATTLE MAT I SHOWED:
(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)

2 MAT SET
(USA) http://amzn.to/2yTaFqM
(CANADA) https://amzn.to/2PWF3Jb

4 MAT SET
(USA) https://amzn.to/2KDLRp1
(CANADA) https://amzn.to/2P6DcMI

NO FAT ZEBRA DID NOT SPONSOR THIS VIDEO, I JUST CONTINUE TO USE THEIR MATS IN MY GAMES
